title: I buy rp but i dont get my rp
body: i bought 325 rp with visa card and the game don't give me back RPs (I take a error)

replies.body: First, try closing your client and logging back in. If that doesn't work then check your bank account and see if the funds went through. If the funds were taken from your bank account and you still don't have your rp, then make a support ticket.
